Navigation

About

This website was developed by Andrey Butenko, January 2018. This was in response to a prompt given by the University of Washington's Expository Writing Program; the end result is a website communicating the effectiveness of Seattle's response to homelessness and providing an opportunity for visitors to take action..

This website is open-source!

Have feedback on this project? Email me: andrey@andrey.ninja.
